_comment: Created by hdorning on 23/08/2017 15:38:42 using v2.7
title: How has the proportion of cancelled operations changed?
analysis_commentary:
In Q4 2016/17 there were 21,219 elective operations cancelled from a total of over 2 million elective operations performed, accounting for 1.8% of these admissions. The percentage of elective operations cancelled has decreased over time and ranges from a maximum of 1.8% to a minimum of 0.7%. There is also a slight seasonal variation in the proportion of elective operations cancelled with the proportion often marginally higher in Q4.

Updated July 2017.
